verses.verse: I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> beside the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5221>Smite<s%> the <S%H3730>capitals<s%>, that the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> may <S%H7493>shake<s%>; and <S%H1214>break<s%> them in pieces on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all of <S%H2026>them<s%>; and I will slay the <S%H319>last<s%> of them with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: there shall not one of them <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H5127>away<s%>, and there shall <S%H4422>not<s%> one of them <S%H6412>escape<s%>.

Though they <S%H2864>dig<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, thence shall my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5927>them<s%>; and though they climb up to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, thence will I bring them <S%H3381>down<s%>.

And though they <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%>, I will <S%H2664>search<s%> and take them <S%H3947>out<s%> <S%H5641>thence<s%>; and though they be hid from my <S%H5869>sight<s%> in the <S%H7172>bottom<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, thence will I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, and it shall bite <S%H5391>them<s%>.

And though they <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, thence will I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and it shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H7760>them<s%>: and I will set mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon them for <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and not for <S%H2896>good<s%>.

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, is he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and it <S%H4127>melteth<s%>, and all that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall <S%H56>mourn<s%>; and it shall rise <S%H5927>up<s%> wholly like the <S%H2975>River<s%>, and shall <S%H8257>sink<s%> <S%H2975>again<s%>, like the River of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

it is he that <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> his <S%H4609>chambers<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and hath <S%H3245>founded<s%> his <S%H92>vault<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; he that <S%H7121>calleth<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and poureth them <S%H8210>out<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

Are ye not as the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, O children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. Have not I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H3731>Caphtor<s%>, and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> from <S%H7024>Kir<s%>?

Behold <S%H5869><s%>, the eyes of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> are upon the <S%H2403>sinful<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, and I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>; <S%H657>save<s%> that I will not <S%H8045>utterly<s%> <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

For <S%H6680><s%>, lo, I will command, and I will <S%H5128>sift<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, like as grain is <S%H5128>sifted<s%> in a <S%H3531>sieve<s%>, yet shall not the least <S%H6872>kernel<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

All the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, who <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall not <S%H5066>overtake<s%> nor meet <S%H6923>us<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H5521>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> that is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, and close <S%H1443>up<s%> the <S%H6556>breaches<s%> <S%H6965>thereof<s%>; and I will raise up its <S%H2034>ruins<s%>, and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> it as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>;

that they may <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that doeth <S%H6213>this<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that the <S%H2790>plowman<s%> shall <S%H5066>overtake<s%> the <S%H7114>reaper<s%>, and the <S%H1869>treader<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%> him that <S%H4900>soweth<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5197>drop<s%> sweet <S%H6071>wine<s%>, and all the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall <S%H4127>melt<s%>.

And I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H8074>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H5193>them<s%>; and they shall plant <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H6213>thereof<s%>; they shall also make <S%H1593>gardens<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the fruit of <S%H6529>them<s%>.

And I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them upon their <S%H127>land<s%>, and they shall no more be plucked <S%H5428>up<s%> out of their <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
